self_predictions.prediction_summary: Devon believes he will destroy Denis and win the match, citing his improvement over the past five years and Denis's setbacks.
self_predictions.style_conflict: Devon thinks Denis is a better arm wrestler now but still believes he will win.

Denis Cyplenkov.strength: Devon respects Denis's strength and sacrifice but believes his own training and consistency will prevail.
Denis Cyplenkov.health: Notes Denis's past health issues and surgeries.
Denis Cyplenkov.previous_match_summary: Mentions Denis's match with John Brzenk and questions whether Denis was fully trying.

self_predictions.prediction_summary: Denis believes he has a good chance to win, citing his current training and mindset. He feels he is improving and will be ready for the match.
self_predictions.style_conflict: Denis acknowledges Devon's improvements but remains confident in his own abilities.

Devon Larratt.strength: Denis jokes about Devon losing weight but understands his strategy for endurance.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Babken strongly supports Denis, citing his training and preparation. He also humorously suggests Devon needs an exorcism to remove negative influences.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Babken believes Denis's current style and training under his guidance make him a better arm wrestler.

Devon Larratt.strength: Babken thinks Devon is strong but has negative influences affecting him.

Denis Cyplenkov.strength: Babken views Denis as a saint-like figure with immense strength and dedication.
Denis Cyplenkov.health: Notes Denis's past surgeries and recovery.
Denis Cyplenkov.previous_match_summary: Highlights Denis's match with John Brzenk and his support during Denis's surgery.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Engin notes the historical significance of the match and the long wait for it. He emphasizes the importance of the match beyond just determining who faces Levan.

Devon Larratt.strength: Engin respects Devon as a promoter and ambassador of the sport.

Denis Cyplenkov.strength: Engin acknowledges Denis's strength and the support from Babken.
